Name: Tower of Waifus 2
About the game: Thousands of years from the last time your ancestor defeated the Demon Lord's army, they were reborn and kidnapped all waifus in the world again. Continue your hero mission, you set out to conquer the Demon Lord's castle. Funny and smart Sokoban puzzle Live2D beautiful waifus Animated enemies and chibi girl Exciting boss fight Exciting techno music Beautiful backgrounds
